strategies.strategyTitle: Bureau of Land Management Data Center Consolidation/Optimization
strategies.useOfSavingsAvoidance: Re-invested into BLM Core Data Center to absorb additional collocated systems and ability to achieve facility power utilization efficiency, per OMB requirement.
Avoidance can be used to further support the mission while sustaining the quality and integrity of the Centrify product.
The budget for the Office of Information Management and Technology - Indian Affairs was reduced therefore there was no reinvestment.

For the Denver Data Center a portion of the cost avoidance was spent to return the space to its original office space configuration for GSA. Another portion of the cost avoidance was used for upgrades to the BLM Core Data Center and BOR Core Switch. Upgrades also include purchase and install of new single mode fiber to each telecommunication closet. Upgrades to BLM Core Data Center also include purchase of DVR and security camera system.
Continue use of VMware for virtualization to reduce physical server counts.  Will also study reducing computer room floor space and consolidation of services at other facilities where appropriate.
Any and all FDCCI-related cost avoidances will be reinvested to virtualize FWS storage solutions allowing FWS to position itself better for any COOP event.
Cost avoidance re-invested in modernization of OneGSS infrastructure, LAN, phone systems, etc.
OHA re-invested data center cost avoidance into migrating and maintaining OHA's infrastructure in a core data center hosting environment.
Cost avoidance directly passed on to customers in the form of lower hosting costs.
